summary: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.
cast: Al Pacino|Martin Donovan|Oliver 'Ole' Zemen|Hilary Swank|Paul Dooley|Nicky Katt|Larry Holden|Jay Brazeau|Lorne Cardinal|James Hutson|Andrew Campbell|Paula Shaw|Yan-Kay Crystal Lowe|Tasha Simms|Maura Tierney|Jonathan Jackson|Malcolm Boddington|Katharine Isabelle|Robin Williams|Kerry Sandomirsky|Chris Gauthier|Ian Tracey|Kate Robbins|Emily Perkins|Dean Wray
keywords: murder of a teenage girl|united states|detective|murder|police
title: Insomnio
